alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Harrison; Jackson; Pearl River; Walthall (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued December 14 at 2:19PM CST until December 14 at 8:00PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 588 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 8 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN LOUISIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 13 PARISHES IN SOUTHEAST LOUISIANA ASSUMPTION JEFFERSON LAFOURCHE ORLEANS PLAQUEMINES ST. BERNARD ST. CHARLES ST. JAMES ST. JOHN THE BAPTIST ST. TAMMANY TANGIPAHOA TERREBONNE WASHINGTON IN MISSISSIPPI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 5 COUNTIES IN SOUTHERN MISSISSIPPI HANCOCK HARRISON JACKSON PEARL RIVER WALTHALL THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF AMITE, BAY ST. LOUIS, BAYOU CANE, BELLE CHASSE, BOGALUSA, BURAS, CHALMETTE, CONVENT, COVINGTON, CROSSROADS, CUT OFF, DESTREHAN, DEXTER, DIAMONDHEAD, EAST NEW ORLEANS, ENON, FRANKLINTON, GALLIANO, GAUTIER, GRAMERCY, GULFPORT, HAMMOND, HOUMA, KENNER, LABADIEVILLE, LACOMBE, LAPLACE, LAROSE, LUTCHER, MANDEVILLE, MCNEIL, METAIRIE, MOSS POINT, NEW ORLEANS, NORCO, OCEAN SPRINGS, PAINCOURTVILLE, PASCAGOULA, PICAYUNE, PIERRE PART, POINTE A LA HACHE, PONCHATOULA, PORT SULPHUR, RACELAND, RESERVE, ROBERT, SALEM, SLIDELL, ST. MARTIN, THIBODAUX, TYLERTOWN, VIOLET, AND WAVELAND.
